name: Morbus Obscura
description:
Words of a ravaging plague reached you. The entire Continent is in peril.

Strange appearances, shadows coming down from the depths of the woods, people going mad or disappearing.

And you - far away from home, fearing for your family's safety - you try to return to them before it is too late.

Morbus Obscura is a first-person, horror-adventure game developed by [DARK:CODE]. Built with Unity.
